ca.cgjennings.spelling.dict

Class FrequencyAnalyzer.WordCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.cgjennings.spelling.dict.FrequencyAnalyzer.WordCounter
  • Enclosing class:
    FrequencyAnalyzer

    public class FrequencyAnalyzer.WordCounter
extends Object
    A callback object that allows a FrequencyAnalyzer.CorpusProcessor to register the words that it observes with this FrequencyAnalyzer.

    • Method Detail

      • count

        public void count(String word,
                  int occurrences)
        Causes the FrequencyAnalyzer to register the specified number of occurrences of the given word. If the word is not in the word list, this has no effect. Otherwise, the frequency analyzer will update its internal statistics accordingly.
        Parameters:
        word - the word that was observed
        occurrences - the number of occurrences to register
